text: All of us every single year, we're a different person. I don't think we're the same person all our lives.
author: Steven Spielberg

text: Deep breaths are very helpful at shallow parties.
author: Barbara Walters

text: Sometimes too much to drink is barely enough.
author: Mark Twain

text: I get half a million just to show up at parties. My life is, like, really, really fun.
author: Paris Hilton

text: A year from now, you're gonna weigh more or less than what you do right now.
author: Phil McGraw

text: I have no way of knowing how people really feel, but the vast majority of those I meet couldn't be nicer. Every once in a while someone barks at me. My New Year's resolution is not to bark back.
author: Tucker Carlson

text: To have the kind of year you want to have, something has to happen that you can't explain why it happened. Something has to happen that you can't coach.
author: Bobby Bowden

text: I like to go to parties where I know everyone. How are you going to have fun with people you don't know?
author: Mary-Kate Olsen

text: I've had some lovely extraordinary experiences on New Year's Eve.
author: Debbie Harry

text: Let our New Year's resolution be this: we will be there for one another as fellow members of humanity, in the finest sense of the word.
author: Goran Persson

text: If you want an interesting party sometime, combine cocktails and a fresh box of crayons for everyone.
author: Robert Fulghum

text: Strange to see how a good dinner and feasting reconciles everybody.
author: Samuel Pepys

text: I doubt if you can have a truly wild party without liquor.
author: Carl Sandburg

text: At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well, and talk well but not too wisely.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

text: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

text: Celebrate what you want to see more of.
author: Tom Peters

text: What is there more kindly than the feeling between host and guest?
author: Aeschylus

text: Good parties create a temporary youthfulness.
author: Mason Cooley

text: Dinner was made for eating, not for talking.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

text: I know. I'm lazy. But I made myself a New Years resolution that I would write myself something really special. Which means I have 'til December, right?
author: Catherine O'Hara

text: If you asked me for my New Year Resolution, it would be to find out who I am.
author: Cyril Cusack

text: Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love.
author: Wally Lamb
